ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Server/Guild Help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Alexander Jones To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Tuesday, December 02, 2003 6:37 PM Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Server/Guild Help Im on Kane, what
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Alexander Jones
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, December 02, 2003 6:37 PM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Server/Guild Help

Im on Kane, what are you searching for really?



-----Original Message-----
From: jersey_jager [mailto:jersey_jager@...]
Sent: den 2 december 2003 04:26
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Server/Guild Help


Evening noble players,

I am new to this group and a semi-newbie back from a EQ break.  My
guild (Blackburrow Brawlers) has just about died out (on Kane Bayle
server).  I am looking for a good server/guild that will allow me to
join and if necessary start fresh on a new server.  Do any of you
noble knights and ladies have any advice on where to go to find a
good server and a strong active guild?

Many thanks and blessings upon you, noble warriors...

Xxana
Cleric 7




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
